item.description:
Local Premiere of Forks Over Knives!

The new revolutionary film, Forks over Knives, will be shown by Optimum Health Solution. Forks Over Knives examines the profound claim that most, if not all, of the degenerative diseases that afflict us can be controlled, or even reversed, by rejecting our present menu of animal-based and processed foods.

The film will be shown on Wednesday August 17th at 126 Myrtle Street in Waltham. For directions, see website www.optimumhealthsolution.org.

There will be a potluck before the film at 6:00 PM, the film will be shown from 7:00 to 8:30, and a discussion will follow after the film. A tax deductible donation of $5.00 is suggested. Due to space limitations this event can only have a maximum of 20 people so please RSVP soon to bbski @ stanfordalumni.org or call 617.835.2913 with your name, email and phone number and what raw vegan, organic, unprocessed dish you are bringing to the potluck. Remember to label your serving dish and utensils and bring a copy of the recipe.

Please only bring RAW, ORGANIC, VEGAN, UNPROCESSED dishes all prepared with utensils to serve. For ideas of what to bring, visit our website for 300 recipes www.optimumhealthsolution.org. Bring slippers if you wish. Shoes left at door.

Note: The film, Forks Over Knives, has just recently come out and there is a very small chance that it will not be here on time. If that is the case we will watch the film, May I Be Frank, instead.

Betsy Bragg
Executive Director
Optimum Health Solution
337 Newton Street #4
Waltham, MA 02453
617.835.2913 work
781.899.6664
Email: bbski @ stanfordalumni . org
www.OptimumHealthSolution.org

______________________________________________

Forks Over Knives: The Plant-Based Way to Health [Book]
